function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of robots increasing due to pandemics","Impact":"Decreased employment opportunities for humans","Mitigation":"Investing in retraining and reskilling programs for the workforce","Technologies":"Automation and AI for job retraining","People":"Workers, employees","Owner":"Government, employers"},{"Description":"Pandemics affecting robot adoption in industries","Impact":"Increased reliance on robots to mitigate human health risks","Mitigation":"Implementing strict workplace safety protocols to protect human workers","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring, AI for predictive analysis","People":"Workers, employees","Owner":"Employers, health and safety regulators"},{"Description":"Inadequate control of global business cycles","Impact":"Challenges in managing economic stability and workforce needs","Mitigation":"Implementing agile economic and labor policies to respond to fluctuations","Technologies":"Economic forecasting models, AI for workforce planning","People":"Governments, employers","Owner":"Economic policymakers, employers"}]}
